languages.text: "Что я слышу? Сам{mf||а} {name} фон Валанциус, Вольный Торговец Империума и верн{mf|ый|ая} слуга Бога-Императора подначивает меня пойти на предательство Человечества?" {n}Каллигос с издевкой выгибает бровь.{/n} "Быстро же власть, дарованная Патентом, ослепила твой разум".

traits.locale_text: "Что я слышу? Сам{mf||а} {name} фон Валанциус, Вольный Торговец Империума и верн{mf|ый|ая} слуга Бога-Императора подначивает меня пойти на предательство Человечества?" {n}Каллигос с издевкой выгибает бровь.{/n} "Быстро же власть, дарованная Патентом, ослепила твой разум".
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: "What is that I hear? {name} von Valancius {mf|himself|herself}, a Rogue Trader of the Imperium and a loyal servant of the God-Emperor, goading me into betraying Humanity?" {n}Calligos arches an eyebrow mockingly.{/n} "It did not take long for the power granted by the Warrant to go to your head."
languages.original_text: "Что я слышу? Сам{mf||а} {name} фон Валанциус, Вольный Торговец Империума и верн{mf|ый|ая} слуга Бога-Императора подначивает меня пойти на предательство Человечества?" {n}Каллигос с издевкой выгибает бровь.{/n} "Быстро же власть, дарованная Патентом, ослепила твой разум".

traits.locale_text: "What is it that I hear? {name} von Valancius {mf|himself|herself}, a Rogue Trader of the Imperium and a loyal servant of the God-Emperor is goading me into betraying the Humanity?" {n}Calligos arches an eyebrow mockingly.{/n} "It did not take long for the power grated by the Warrant to go to your head."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: "What is it that I hear? {name} von Valancius {mf|himself|herself}, a Rogue Trader of the Imperium and a loyal servant of the God-Emperor is goading me into betraying the Humanity?" {n}Calligos arches an eyebrow mockingly.{/n} "It did not take long for the power grated by the Warrant to go to your head."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: "What is it that I hear? {name} von Valancius {mf|himself|herself}, a Rogue Trader of the Imperium and a loyal servant of the God-Emperor is goading me into betraying Humanity?" {n}Calligos arches an eyebrow mockingly.{/n} "It did not take long for the power granted by the Warrant to go to your head."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: "What is that I hear? {name} von Valancius {mf|himself|herself}, a Rogue Trader of the Imperium and a loyal servant of the God-Emperor, goading me into betraying Humanity?" {n}Calligos arches an eyebrow mockingly.{/n} "It did not take long for the power granted by the Warrant to go to your head."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: "What is that I hear? {name} von Valancius {mf|himself|herself}, a Rogue Trader of the Imperium and a loyal servant of the God-Emperor, goading me into betraying Humanity?" {n}Calligos arches an eyebrow mockingly.{/n} "It did not take long for the power granted by the Warrant to go to your head."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: «¿Qué acabo de oír? ¿{mf|El mismísimo|La mismísima} {name} von Valancius, Comerciante Independiente del Imperium y fiel {mf|siervo|sierva} del Dios Emperador, me incita a traicionar a la Humanidad?». {n}Calligos arquea una ceja con sorna.{/n} «El poder otorgado por la patente no ha tardado en subírsele a la cabeza».
languages.original_text: "What is that I hear? {name} von Valancius {mf|himself|herself}, a Rogue Trader of the Imperium and a loyal servant of the God-Emperor, goading me into betraying Humanity?" {n}Calligos arches an eyebrow mockingly.{/n} "It did not take long for the power granted by the Warrant to go to your head."

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué acabo de oír? ¿{mf|El mismísimo|La mismísima} {name} von Valancius, Comerciante Independiente del Imperium y fiel {mf|siervo|sierva} del Dios Emperador, me incita a traicionar a la Humanidad?». {n}Calligos arquea una ceja con sorna.{/n} «El poder otorgado por la patente no ha tardado en subírsele a la cabeza».
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: “我这听到的都是什么胡话？{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯，帝国的行商浪人，神皇的忠实仆人，打算煽动我背叛人类？”{n}卡里戈斯嘲讽般地扬起眉毛。{/n}“这才过了多久，授状的权力就让你冲昏了头。”
languages.original_text: "What is that I hear? {name} von Valancius {mf|himself|herself}, a Rogue Trader of the Imperium and a loyal servant of the God-Emperor, goading me into betraying Humanity?" {n}Calligos arches an eyebrow mockingly.{/n} "It did not take long for the power granted by the Warrant to go to your head."

traits.locale_text: “我这听到的都是什么胡话？{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯，帝国的行商浪人，神皇的忠实仆人，打算煽动我背叛人类？”{n}卡里戈斯嘲讽般地扬起眉毛。{/n}“这才过了多久，许可证的权力就让你冲昏了头。”
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: « Qu'entends-je ? {name} von Valancius {mf|lui|elle}-même, libre-{mf|marchand|marchande} de l'Imperium et fidèle {mf|serviteur|servante} de l'Empereur-Dieu, m'incite à trahir l'humanité ? {n}demande Calligos en haussant un sourcil d'un air moqueur.{/n} Il n'aura pas fallu longtemps pour que le pouvoir de votre lettre de marque vous monte à la tête. »
languages.original_text: "What is that I hear? {name} von Valancius {mf|himself|herself}, a Rogue Trader of the Imperium and a loyal servant of the God-Emperor, goading me into betraying Humanity?" {n}Calligos arches an eyebrow mockingly.{/n} "It did not take long for the power granted by the Warrant to go to your head."

traits.locale_text: « Qu'entends-je ? {name} von Valancius {mf|lui|elle}-même, libre-{mf|marchand|marchande} de l'Imperium et fidèle {mf|serviteur|servante} de l'empereur-Dieu, m'incite à trahir l'humanité ? {n}demande Calligos en haussant un sourcil d'un air moqueur.{/n} Il n'aura pas fallu longtemps pour que le pouvoir de votre lettre de marque vous monte à la tête. »
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: 「何と言った？{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス、帝国の自由開拓者であり、神帝陛下の忠実なるしもべであるお前が、人類を裏切るように俺を唆しているのか？」{n}カリゴスは、あざ笑うように眉を寄せる。{/n}「令状によって与えられた権力が、お前の頭に回るまで、そう時間はかからなかったな」
languages.original_text: "What is that I hear? {name} von Valancius {mf|himself|herself}, a Rogue Trader of the Imperium and a loyal servant of the God-Emperor, goading me into betraying Humanity?" {n}Calligos arches an eyebrow mockingly.{/n} "It did not take long for the power granted by the Warrant to go to your head."

traits.locale_text: 「何と言った？{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス、帝国の自由開拓者であり、神帝陛下の忠実なるしもべであるお前が、人類を裏切るように俺を唆しているのか？」{n}カリゴスは、あざ笑うように眉を寄せる。{/n}「令状によって与えられた権力が、お前の頭に回るまで、そう時間はかからなかったな」
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: "Was höre ich da? {name} von Valancius selbst, {mf|ein Freihändler des Imperiums und ein treuer Diener|eine Freihändlerin des Imperiums und eine treue Dienerin} des Gottimperators will mich dazu bringen, die Menschheit zu verraten?" {n}Calligos zieht spöttisch eine Augenbraue hoch.{/n} "Es hat ja nicht sehr lange gedauert, bis Euch die Macht des Handelsbriefs zu Kopf steigt."
languages.original_text: "What is that I hear? {name} von Valancius {mf|himself|herself}, a Rogue Trader of the Imperium and a loyal servant of the God-Emperor, goading me into betraying Humanity?" {n}Calligos arches an eyebrow mockingly.{/n} "It did not take long for the power granted by the Warrant to go to your head."

traits.locale_text: "Was höre ich da? {name} von Valancius selbst, {mf|ein Freihändler des Imperiums und ein treuer Diener|eine Freihändlerin des Imperiums und eine treue Dienerin} des Gottimperators will mich dazu bringen, die Menschheit zu verraten?" {n}Calligos zieht spöttisch eine Augenbraue hoch.{/n} "Es hat ja nicht sehr lange gedauert, bis Euch die Macht des Handelsbriefs zu Kopf steigt."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: "Kulağıma gelen de ne? İmparatorluk'un Hür Tacir'i ve Tanrı İmparator'un sadık hizmetkârı {name} von Valancius {mf|beyefendi|hanımefendi}, beni İnsanlığa ihanete mi teşvik ediyor?" {n}Calligos, alaycı bir şekilde kaşını kaldırıyor.{/n} "Ruhsatname'nin bahşettiği gücün başına vurması uzun sürmedi."
languages.original_text: "What is that I hear? {name} von Valancius {mf|himself|herself}, a Rogue Trader of the Imperium and a loyal servant of the God-Emperor, goading me into betraying Humanity?" {n}Calligos arches an eyebrow mockingly.{/n} "It did not take long for the power granted by the Warrant to go to your head."

traits.locale_text: "Kulağıma gelen de ne? {name} von Valancius {mf|beyefendi|hanımefendi}, İmparatorluk'un Hür Tacir'i ve Tanrı İmparator'un sadık hizmetkârı, beni İnsanlık'a ihanete mi teşvik ediyor? {n}Calligos, alaycı bir şekilde kaşını kaldırıyor.{/n} "Ruhsatname'nin bahşettiği gücün başına vurması uzun sürmedi."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale
